name: pnp-powerapps-samples-timesheet
title: Timesheet
shortDescription: This timesheet application is a tablet-based canvas app that gives you a way to create and manage weekly timesheets.
longDescription: This timesheet application is a tablet-based canvas app that gives you a way to create and manage weekly timesheets.
